useCase.name: Access Repository Information
useCase.description: Depositor accesses repository information through the web interface.

preconditions.precondition: Depositor is logged in and has access to the web interface.

successEndConditions.condition: Depositor successfully views accepted items and formats.

failureEndConditions.condition: Depositor is unable to view accepted items and formats.

useCase.trigger: Depositor initiates the action to access repository information.

mainSequence.step: Depositor accesses the repository information through the web interface.
Web interface requests accepted items and formats from EDRMS.
EDRMS retrieves item types and formats.
Format and Type Management retrieves types and recommended formats.
EDRMS displays the information to the web interface.
Web interface shows accepted item types and formats to the Depositor.
